item.title: The turmeric latte mix simplifies the process of enjoying golden milk
item.description: A sample pack of turmeric latte mix. Nature’s Harvest Turmeric Latte Mix, produced in Western Australia and available in Singapore and Malaysia through distributor 1000Tsuru via their website Goldenmylk, leverages the increasing consumer interest in turmeric’s health advantages. Andre Lim, based in Australia, and Paul Ong, in Singapore, co-founded 1000Tsuru to expand the reach of this vegan, naturopath-endorsed blend beyond Australia. “We are the primary distributor for Singapore and Malaysia, but we are aiming to introduce it to the broader Asian market soon,” Lim stated.
